name: Halftone Posters
description: This is a collection of Halftone posters I made mostly to train my photoshop skills. I have used some of my different passions such as film, music and manga for subjects for these posters.
shortdescription: This is a collection of Halftone posters I made mostly to train my Photoshop skills…

name: Planning Tool
description:
Planning Tool lets students register themselves and choose 3 courses to follow. Planning is dynamic and is adapted for each student. Administrators can manage users, teachers, courses and plan a number of sessions for each course in an instant. 
 
 Using Laravel Sail, the goal was to create a back-end application in a Docker Container. Tables in the database have some relationships between eachother but nothing complex. 
 
 This was created for my Back-End course I took in 2023
shortdescription: Planning Tool lets students register themselves and choose 3 courses to follow. Planning is dynamic…
